customer: Hey, you sell stuff here too right?
I'm looking to buy something.
Got a minute? I need to pick something up.
Hi there. Shopping today.
Just browsing... actually no, I need something specific.
You got accessories and stuff?
Need to grab something real quick.
Perfect, you're open. I need to buy...
This is the right place for tech stuff, yeah?
Hi! Looking for something.
player: What can I get for you?
Looking for something specific?
Sure, what do you need?
Buying today? What are you after?
Let me know what you're looking for.
What can I help you find?
Shopping? Sure, what do you need?
I've got some things in stock. What's on your list?
What brings you to the sales counter?
Looking to buy? What do you need?

dialogue: Just need a charging cable.
My cable stopped working. Need a replacement.
Got any good quality cables?
Lost my cable. Again. Need another one.
Looking for a cable that won't break in a month.
Need a longer cable for my setup.
My old cable is fraying. Time for a new one.
Do you have fast charging cables?
I keep breaking cables. Got a durable one?
Simple cable purchase today.
Do you have screen protectors?
I crack screens constantly. Need protection.
Looking for something to protect my screen.
Glass protector please. The good kind.
Privacy screen would be nice. Nosy coworkers.
My old protector is scratched to hell.
What's your best screen protector?
Something to keep my screen from shattering.
Tempered glass, do you carry it?
Need screen protection before I regret it.
Looking for a phone case.
Need something to protect my device.
Got any good rugged cases?
I want a case but nothing bulky.
Clear case so I can see the color.
Dropped my phone too many times. Case time.
What cases do you have in stock?
Need a case with card slots.
Laptop sleeve? Something padded.
Tablet case for my kid. Durable.
Need more storage - got any memory cards?
Running out of space. Need external storage.
USB drive please. Big one.
Memory card for my camera.
Looking for an SSD. External.
Cheapest storage option you got?
Need to backup some files. USB drive?
My phone needs more space. SD card?
External hard drive. Lots of space.
Fast storage. SSD if you have it.
Any wireless earbuds?
My earbuds died. Need new ones.
Looking for headphones. Something decent.
Gaming headset? With a good mic.
Bluetooth earbuds please.
I need a microphone for calls.
Small speaker for my desk?
My headphone jack is broken. Bluetooth adapter?
Good sound quality earbuds?
Wired earbuds. Old school, I know.
Need a power bank for travel.
My phone dies too fast. Portable charger?
Fast charger. The quick charge kind.
Wireless charger for my desk.
Car charger please.
Battery pack. Big capacity.
I travel a lot. Need portable power.
Multi-port charger for the family.
Lost my charger. Need a universal one.
Something to keep my phone alive all day.
Need a new mouse. Wireless.
My keyboard is dying. Replacement?
Webcam for video calls.
USB hub? I need more ports.
Gaming mouse. Something responsive.
Mechanical keyboard if you have one.
Good mouse pad? Big one.
Laptop stand for ergonomics.
Simple keyboard. Nothing fancy.
Need peripherals for my new setup.
Got any phone stands?
My desk is a cable mess. Organizers?
Screen cleaning kit please.
Webcam cover. Paranoid, I know.
Stylus for my tablet.
Lost my SIM tool. Again.
Thermal paste for a build.
Cleaning supplies for electronics.
Little things. Organizing my setup.
Random tech stuff I keep forgetting to buy.

accept: Fine, I'll go with the better one.
You make a good point. I'll upgrade.
Okay okay, give me the good one.
Worth it I guess. Let's do it.
You're good at this. Fine, I'll take it.
Might as well get the better version.
reject: No thanks, I'll just take the original.
Nah, the basic one is fine.
I'm good with what I asked for.
I'll stick with my original choice.
I know my needs. Original is fine.

sale_complete: Thanks. Good shop you got here.
Sweet. I'll be back if I need more.
Just what I was looking for.

customer: Oh, you're out? That's unfortunate.
No stock? Alright, I'll try somewhere else.
Bummer. Okay, thanks anyway.
When do you get more in?
That's a shame. Maybe next time.
Seriously? Ugh. Fine.
I really needed that today...
Guess I'll order online then.
No worries. I'll check back later.
That's okay. Got anything similar?
player: Sorry, we're out of that.
Fresh out, unfortunately.
Not in stock right now. Sorry.
Just sold the last one earlier.
Shipment's coming but not today.
Can't help you there. Out of stock.
None left. Check back next week?
Don't have that one currently.
